SEARCH
Package shapes.base

Class VectorialObject

java.lang.Object
shapes.base.VectorialObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Movable, Transformable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Rectangle
public abstract class VectorialObject extends Object implements Transformable, Cloneable, Serializable
Represents the base object class for all shapes

Provides common transformation (translation, rotation, scaling), appearance (color, line width), and identification logic. Intended to be extended by specific shape types.

See Also:

    • VectorialObject

      public VectorialObject()
      Constructs a VectorialObject with random position, default scale, base color as fill, and black stroke.

    • VectorialObject

      public VectorialObject(double x, double y, double lineWidth, Color fillColor, Color strokeColor)
      Constructs a VectorialObject with specified position, line width, fill color, and stroke color.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the object
      y - the y-coordinate of the object
      lineWidth - the stroke width
      fillColor - the fill color of the object
      strokeColor - the stroke (border) color
